div.div: We recognize the importance of enjoying life, specially during childhood. It is important to reserve time for the children to play alone and in group and to encourages social games and good relationship between children to increase the sense of family. The games should happen in an safe environment with the surveillance of an appropriate number of adults which are encouraged to participate and cheer them. The games should be adapted in order to make all children participating independently of personal issues such diseases or handicaps.
